data.eml:eml: Three new species of Proceratophrys Miranda-Ribeiro 1920 from Brazilian Cerrado (Anura, Odontophrynidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brandão, Reuber Albuquerque, Caramaschi, Ulisses, Vaz-Silva, Wilian, Campos, Leandro Ambrósio (2013): Three new species of Proceratophrys Miranda-Ribeiro 1920 from Brazilian Cerrado (Anura, Odontophrynidae). Zootaxa 3750 (4): 321-347, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.4.2
